definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: Their house is furthermost on the right.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子是在右侧最远的那一栋。

sentences.english: A little boy was standing in the farthest corner of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 一个小男孩站在花园最远的一个角落里。

sentences.english: It only goes as far as Fifth Avenue, but you can get the No. 9 there.
sentences.chinese: 最远只到第五大道，不过你可以到那里再乘9路。

sentences.english: What language do they speak in the furthest reaches?
sentences.chinese: 位于最远那一端的用户说什么语言呢？

sentences.english: A comet is at aphelion when it is farthest from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 彗星离太阳最远时就是在它的远日点上。

sentences.english: At its furthest point from the Equator, what latitude is Singapore situated at, approximately?
sentences.chinese: 新加坡离赤道最远点处，其纬度大约是多少？

sentences.english: I went to the furthest room and watched the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我走进最远的房间看雪。

sentences.english: Drawing what is furthest away first and overdrawing things that are nearer.
sentences.chinese: 图纸是什么接近第一和透支你最远的东西。

sentences.english: The most distant luminous objects seen by telescopes are very far.
sentences.chinese: 通过望远镜见到的最远的发光体离我们非常远。

sentences.english: Prized by medieval royalty, inspiration for unicorn myths, narwhal tusks have driven men to extremes for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 几个世纪以来，独角鲸的角让人们去到世界的最远端。

sentences.english: The point in an orbit most distant from the body being orbited.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛能够看清楚物体的最远点。

sentences.english: The farthest place Ted had travelled to was Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 泰德去过的最远的地方是芝加哥。

sentences.english: I will go however, as far as the farthest of all to find you.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样我会去，到最远的地方找到你。

sentences.english: No, It only goes as far as Main Street, but you can get the Number 31 there.
sentences.chinese: 不去，最远只到正街，不过你可以到那里再乘31路。

sentences.english: Search the furthest villages, find more metal.
sentences.chinese: 到最远的村庄去查探，找更多的金属回来。

sentences.english: Eurogamer: How long do you think it can last like that?
sentences.chinese: 你认为这样最远会延续多久呢？

definition: distance apart/separated by a given distance
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
at a distance of/distance/to be apart
mile (unit of length equal to 1.609 km)
